activity: Stroll through the Botanischer Garten Münster
description: Take a peaceful walk through the Botanischer Garten Münster, exploring diverse plant species and seasonal blooms in a serene environment.

locationInfo.description: This botanical garden offers a tranquil escape with beautifully curated plant collections, a pond, and shaded benches for relaxation.
safetyTips: Stay on designated paths to protect the plant life.
Check the weather forecast to dress appropriately.

description: Visit the vibrant Wochenmarkt Münster, where you can browse fresh produce, local delicacies, and artisanal goods while enjoying the lively atmosphere.

locationInfo.description: One of the most famous markets in Münster, the Wochenmarkt is a great place to experience local culture and taste fresh regional products.
safetyTips: Keep an eye on personal belongings in crowded areas.
Carry some cash as not all vendors accept cards.

description: Enjoy a refreshing walk along the Promenade, Münster’s famous green belt that encircles the old town, perfect for a leisurely group stroll.

locationInfo.description: This tree-lined path is ideal for a scenic walk or a short cycling trip, offering a peaceful break from the city's hustle and bustle.
safetyTips: Be mindful of cyclists sharing the path.
Wear comfortable shoes for walking on paved surfaces.

description: Discover the historic Zwinger Münster, an old fortress with a fascinating history and unique architecture, perfect for a short cultural excursion.

locationInfo.description: A historical landmark with a mix of medieval and World War II history, offering an intriguing visit for history enthusiasts.
safetyTips: Follow all visitor guidelines for safety.
Be cautious when walking on uneven surfaces.

activity: Coffee break at Café Herr Sonnenschein
description: Take a break at Café Herr Sonnenschein, a charming café in Münster known for its cozy ambiance, delicious coffee, and homemade cakes.

locationInfo.description: A welcoming café with a selection of organic coffee, fresh pastries, and comfortable seating—great for a relaxing group gathering.
safetyTips: Check the menu for allergens if needed.
Reserve a table in advance during peak hours.
